channel.title: Getting started on cu.css
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on cu.css

item.title: Installation
item.description: There are a few different ways to install cu.css in your project, depending on whether you prefer to work with CSS or SASS. Installing CSS: Download the full project from Github Copy public/css/main.min.css into your project. Copy static/fonts into your project. Download the full project from Github. Grab the CSS from Github Grab the CSS from Github CSS SASS If you plan to work with the SASS files, either: download cu.
